title: FontCase
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016232610/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Software](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016232610/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Software) : [Font Management Software](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016232610/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Font%20Management%20Software) : FontCase**

Font management software for Max OS X created by Pieter Omvlee and Laurent Baumann. Also known as Fontcase. Winner of an [Apple Design Award](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016232610/http:/developer.apple.com/wwdc/ada/index.html).

**External Links**  
 [Official Site](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016232610/http:/www.bohemiancoding.com/fontcase/)  
 [FontCase at FontShop](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016232610/http:/www.fontshop.com/products/fontcase/)
author: Stephen Coles
